title: Pakistan reaffirms to take strategic partnership with Turkiye to new level
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 28 (APP): Foreign Secretary Sohail Mahmood received Turkish Ambassador-designate Mehmet Pacaci here on Tuesday.
During the meeting, the Foreign Secretary highlighted the historic, multi-dimensional fraternal ties between Pakistan and Turkiye, Foreign Office Spokesperson Asim Iftikhar said in a twitter post.
He underscored the importance of successful 7th High Level Strategic Cooperation Council (HLSCC) session and reaffirmed Pakistanâ€™s commitment to take this strategic partnership to new level.
